scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix web"
scripts.dev:verbose: concurrently "npm run dev:verbose --prefix server" "npm run dev:verbose --prefix web"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix web && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.test: npm test --prefix server && npm test --prefix web
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix server && npm run lint --prefix web
scripts.lint:watch: concurrently "npm run lint:watch --prefix server" "npm run lint:watch --prefix web"
scripts.precommit: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix packages/domain && npm install --prefix packages/logging && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix web
